languages.text: Гипнотический танец, казалось, продолжался целую вечность. Несчастные выли, скулили и бились в конвульсиях, не в силах оторвать кровоточащих глаз от небесной сущности. Когда же переливающийся диск затмил сияние местной звезды, телесные оболочки тех, кто некогда были людьми, лопнули, и чудовища, описать которые не в силах даже самое острое перо, вышли на свет.

traits.locale_text: Гипнотический танец, казалось, продолжался целую вечность. Несчастные выли, скулили и бились в конвульсиях, не в силах оторвать кровоточащих глаз от небесной сущности. Когда же переливающийся диск затмил сияние местной звезды, телесные оболчки тех, кто некогда были людьми, лопнули, и чудовища, описать которые не в силах даже самое острое перо, вышли на свет.

languages.text: The hypnotic dance seemed to continue forever. The unfortunate creatures howled, whined and convulsed, unable to tear their bleeding eyes from the celestial body. When the pavonine disk outshone even the light of the local star, the physical shells of the things that used to be men burst, releasing beasts onto this plane that not even the most fluent and capable pen could describe.
languages.original_text: Гипнотический танец, казалось, продолжался целую вечность. Несчастные выли, скулили и бились в конвульсиях, не в силах оторвать кровоточащих глаз от небесной сущности. Когда же переливающийся диск затмил сияние местной звезды, телесные оболочки тех, кто некогда были людьми, лопнули, и чудовища, описать которые не в силах даже самое острое перо, вышли на свет.

traits.locale_text: The hypnotic dance seemed to continue forever. The unfortunate creatures howled, whined and convulsed, unable to tear the bleeding eyes from the celestial body. When the pavonian disk outshone the light of the local star, the physical shells of the things that used to be men burst, releasing the beasts not even the most fluent and capable pen can describe into the world.

The hypnotic dance seemed to continue forever. The unfortunate creatures howled, whined and convulsed, unable to tear the bleeding eyes from the celestial body. When the pavonian disk outshone the light of the local star, the physical shells of the things that used to be men burst, releasing the beasts not even the most fluent and capable pen can describe into the world.

When the pavonine disk outshone even the light of the local star, the physical shells of the things that used to be men burst, releasing beasts onto this plane that not even the most fluent and capable pen could describe.

The hypnotic dance seemed to continue forever. The unfortunate creatures howled, whined and convulsed, unable to tear their bleeding eyes from the celestial body. When the pavonine disk outshone even the light of the local star, the physical shells of the things that used to be men burst, releasing beasts onto this plane that not even the most fluent and capable pen could describe.

languages.text: 这场催眠的舞蹈似乎永远都不会休止。尽管这些不幸的生物嚎叫着、呜咽着、抽搐着，但他们流血的眼睛，仍然死死地盯着那个不明天体。当多彩圆盘所发出的光芒盖过了恒星的光芒时，那些带着人形的怪物变得支离破碎，凶兽从他们身体中钻出，来到这个世界。即便是技艺最精湛的画家手持世上好的画笔，也无法描绘出那样的恐怖景象。
languages.original_text: The hypnotic dance seemed to continue forever. The unfortunate creatures howled, whined and convulsed, unable to tear their bleeding eyes from the celestial body. When the pavonine disk outshone even the light of the local star, the physical shells of the things that used to be men burst, releasing beasts onto this plane that not even the most fluent and capable pen could describe.

traits.locale_text: 这场催眠的舞蹈似乎永远都不会休止。尽管这些不幸的生物嚎叫着、呜咽着、抽搐着，但他们流血的眼睛，仍然死死地盯着那个不明天体。当多彩圆盘所发出的光芒改过了恒星的光芒时，那些带着人形的怪物变得支离破碎，凶兽从他们身体中钻出，来到这个世界。即便是技艺最精湛的画家手持世上好的画笔，也无法描绘出那样的恐怖景象。

languages.text: 眠気を誘うようなダンスは永遠に続くかのように感じた。哀れな生き物は吠え、泣き叫び、痙攣し、天上から血走った目を離すことができなかった。玉虫色の円盤が地元の星の光をも凌駕したとき、かつて人であった者の体が破裂し、最も流暢で有能なペンでさえ描写できないような獣がこの地に放たれた。
languages.original_text: The hypnotic dance seemed to continue forever. The unfortunate creatures howled, whined and convulsed, unable to tear their bleeding eyes from the celestial body. When the pavonine disk outshone even the light of the local star, the physical shells of the things that used to be men burst, releasing beasts onto this plane that not even the most fluent and capable pen could describe.

traits.locale_text: 眠気を誘うようなダンスは永遠に続くかのように感じた。哀れな生き物は吠え、泣き叫び、痙攣し、天上から血走った目を離すことができなかった。玉虫色の円盤が地元の星の光をも凌駕したとき、かつて人であった者の体が破裂し、最も流暢で有能なペンでさえ描写できないような獣がこの地に放たれた。

languages.text: La danza hipnótica parecía no tener fin. Las infelices criaturas aullaban, gemían y convulsionaban, incapaces de apartar sus ojos sangrantes del cuerpo celeste. Cuando el disco pavonino eclipsó incluso la luz de la estrella local, los cascarones de las cosas que solían ser hombres estallaron, liberando bestias en este plano que ni la pluma más fluida y hábil podría describir.
languages.original_text: The hypnotic dance seemed to continue forever. The unfortunate creatures howled, whined and convulsed, unable to tear their bleeding eyes from the celestial body. When the pavonine disk outshone even the light of the local star, the physical shells of the things that used to be men burst, releasing beasts onto this plane that not even the most fluent and capable pen could describe.

traits.locale_text: La danza hipnótica parecía no tener fin. Las infelices criaturas aullaban, gemían y convulsionaban, incapaces de apartar sus ojos {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}sangrantes{/g} del cuerpo celeste. Cuando el disco pavonino eclipsó incluso la luz de la estrella local, los cascarones de las cosas que solían ser hombres estallaron, liberando bestias en este plano que ni la pluma más fluida y hábil podría describir.{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}{/g}

languages.text: Der hypnotische Tanz schien ewig zu dauern. Die bemitleidenswerten Kreaturen heulten, weinten und zuckten, unfähig, ihre blutigen Augen von dem Himmelskörper loszureißen. Als die schillernde Scheibe selbst das Licht des örtlichen Sterns überstrahlte, platzten die körperlichen Hüllen der Dinger, die einst Menschen gewesen waren, und entließen Monster in diese Ebene, die selbst der flüssigste und fähigste Stift nicht beschreiben kann.
languages.original_text: The hypnotic dance seemed to continue forever. The unfortunate creatures howled, whined and convulsed, unable to tear their bleeding eyes from the celestial body. When the pavonine disk outshone even the light of the local star, the physical shells of the things that used to be men burst, releasing beasts onto this plane that not even the most fluent and capable pen could describe.

traits.locale_text: Der hypnotische Tanz schien ewig zu dauern. Die bemitleidenswerten Kreaturen heulten, weinten und zuckten, unfähig, ihre blutigen Augen von dem Himmelskörper loszureißen. Als die schillernde Scheibe selbst das Licht des örtlichen Sterns überstrahlte, platzten die körperlichen Hüllen der Dinger, die einst Menschen gewesen waren, und entließen Monster in diese Ebene, die selbst der flüssigste und fähigste Stift nicht beschreiben kann.

languages.text: Ce ballet hypnotique n'en finit plus. Les malheureuses créatures hurlent, gémissent et se convulsent, incapables de détourner leurs yeux en sang du corps céleste. Lorsque l'éclat aveuglant du disque prismatique éclipse jusqu'à la lumière émise par l'étoile locale, les enveloppes charnelles de ces humanoïdes contrefaits éclatent, libérant sur ce plan des bêtes que la plume la plus inventive ne saurait décrire.
languages.original_text: The hypnotic dance seemed to continue forever. The unfortunate creatures howled, whined and convulsed, unable to tear their bleeding eyes from the celestial body. When the pavonine disk outshone even the light of the local star, the physical shells of the things that used to be men burst, releasing beasts onto this plane that not even the most fluent and capable pen could describe.

traits.locale_text: Ce ballet hypnotique n'en finit plus. Les malheureuses créatures hurlent, gémissent et se convulsent, incapables de détourner leurs yeux en sang du corps céleste. Lorsque l'éclat aveuglant du disque prismatique éclipse jusqu'à la lumière émise par l'étoile locale, les enveloppes charnelles de ces humanoïdes contrefaits éclatent, libérant sur ce plan des bêtes que la plume la plus inventive ne saurait décrire.

languages.text: Bu uyutucu dans bir türlü bitmiyor. Talihsiz yaratıklar çığlık basıyor, inliyor, kıvranıyor ve kanayan gözlerini gök cisminden ayırmıyorlar. Rengârenk diskin kör edici parıltısı, sistemdeki yıldızın ışığını bile gölgede bırakıyor. Bunun üzerine bu deforme olmuş insansıların eti patlıyor ve en yaratıcı kalemlerin bile betimlemekte zorlanacağı yaratıkları bu düzleme salıyor.
languages.original_text: The hypnotic dance seemed to continue forever. The unfortunate creatures howled, whined and convulsed, unable to tear their bleeding eyes from the celestial body. When the pavonine disk outshone even the light of the local star, the physical shells of the things that used to be men burst, releasing beasts onto this plane that not even the most fluent and capable pen could describe.
